title: Creative Ideas PSF0508-029 Solid Satin Ribbon, 5/8" x 100 yd, White
description: Soft and silky 5/8- inch by 100 yard roll of single sided satin ribbon. Make beautiful bows for wedding bouquets, gift wrapping, gift baskets, hair bows and much more. Available in a variety of colors and sizes. Comes in 3/8 , 5/8, 7/8, 1 1/2-inch widths.
